snippet.title: Game & Watch - Climber (Crystal Screen) (c)1986 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
This the Game & Watch Climber (Crystal Screen) handheld game, a Nintendo product released in 1986 and one of 3 units that were released as both New Wide Screen and Crystal Screen units.  I had a previous video for this, but it lacked the case artwork.

These games differ slightly from other Game & Watch entries in that they don't have a Game A and Game B feature, but instead have just a single game mode.  This one I feel plays better than the Super Mario Bros. game, even if the platform structure of it makes it feel similar in design but with vertical movement.

It is believed that the Crystal Screen and New Wide Screen versions of these share the same MCU and ROM data, with only the case and screen being different.

Recent work on Game & Watch emulation has come from Algestam, with earlier work being done by Sean Riddle and hap.  DarthMarino provided the artwork for more recently emulated units, while hydef was generally responsible for the artwork on ones emulated before 2020, links to the artwork are below

https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
